name: CVE-2022-28763
description: The Zoom Client for Meetings (for Android, iOS, Linux, macOS, and Windows) before version 5.12.2 is susceptible to a URL parsing vulnerability. If a malicious Zoom meeting URL is opened, the malicious link may direct the user to connect to an arbitrary network address, leading to additional attacks including session takeovers.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:virtual_desktop_infrastructure:*:*:*:*:*:windows:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:meetings:*:*:*:*:*:android:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:meetings:*:*:*:*:*:iphone_os:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:meetings:*:*:*:*:*:linux:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:meetings:*:*:*:*:*:macos:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:meetings:*:*:*:*:*:windows:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:rooms_for_conference_rooms:*:*:*:*:*:linux:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:rooms_for_conference_rooms:*:*:*:*:*:macos:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:rooms_for_conference_rooms:*:*:*:*:*:iphone_os:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:rooms_for_conference_rooms:*:*:*:*:*:windows:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zoom:rooms_for_conference_rooms:*:*:*:*:*:android:*:*')]
